title: [Large-scale] Writing-integrated Curriculum for Strengthening Data Science Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical analysis, experience with programming languages (Python/R), foundational knowledge of social science research methodologies
context.additional_context: A VR environment replicating real-world social science research scenarios, enabling real-time collaboration using digital devices (tablets/laptops).

learning_goals: Write a structured report (1,000 words) contextualizing data analysis results within social science frameworks.
Interpret data visualization results and apply them to policy proposal-style writing (500 words).
Revise and improve writing outputs at least twice based on peer feedback.

Within one week, learners select two or more phenomena identified during a social phenomenon analysis and write an argumentative essay (300 words) explaining them. They achieve a "B+" or higher in two or more of three rubric items: logical coherence, evidence provision, and structural clarity.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
